column2: Judge dismisses Noriega case against Activision over videogame Oct 28 A U.S. judge has dismissed former Panamanian dictator Manuel Noriega's lawsuit against Activision Blizzard Inc over his depiction in the popular videogame "Call of Duty: Black Ops II."
